t: Inofia Mattress Review: 30 Nights On An Affordable Mattress
s: April 8, 2023 - I bought a 10 inch full size Inofia Hybrid mattress. It has not worked out for me because I am heavy and a side sleeper. It did not provide enough cushion for my hips and shoulders. Also, the edge support was not good and I could feel the springs when I sat on the edge of the bed. It would probably be fine for someone who was average weight. I have a very small bedroom and there is no room for a chair so I have to sit on the bed. I tried a 12 in mattress (another brand...
